speaker: Carlos
text: So, the new feature set was rolled out last night, right?
ipa: soʊ ðə nu ˈfiːtʃər sɛt wəz roʊld aʊt læst naɪt raɪt

speaker: Maya
text: Yes, everything was deployed to production just after midnight. The migration script had been tested thoroughly, so there weren’t any surprises.
ipa: jɛs ˈɛvrɪθɪŋ wəz dɪˈplɔɪd tu prəˈdʌkʃən dʒəst ˈæftər ˈmɪdnaɪt ðə maɪˈɡreɪʃən skrɪpt hæd bɪn ˈtɛstɪd ˈθʌrəli soʊ ðər wɜrənt ˈɛni səˈpraɪzɪz

speaker: Carlos
text: Good. I noticed a couple of config files were modified — do you know if that was logged?
ipa: ɡʊd aɪ ˈnoʊtɪst ə ˈkʌpəl əv ˈkɒnfɪɡ faɪlz wɜr ˈmɒdəˌfaɪd du ju noʊ ɪf ðæt wəz lɔɡd

speaker: Maya
text: Absolutely. All changes were tracked in Git and have been documented in the deployment notes.
ipa: ˌæbsəˈlutli ɔl ˈʧeɪndʒəz wɜr trækt ɪn ɡɪt ənd hæv bɪn ˈdɒkjəˌmɛntɪd ɪn ðə dɪˈplɔɪmənt noʊts

speaker: Carlos
text: Awesome. I also heard the cache was invalidated globally to avoid stale data?
ipa: ˈɔsəm aɪ ˈɔlsoʊ hɜrd ðə kæʃ wəz ɪnˈvælɪˌdeɪtɪd ˈɡloʊbəli tu əˈvɔɪd steɪl ˈdeɪtə

speaker: Maya
text: Correct. That was triggered right after the database updates had been completed.
ipa: kəˈrɛkt ðæt wəz ˈtrɪɡərd raɪt ˈæftər ðə ˈdeɪtəˌbeɪs ˈʌpˌdeɪts hæd bɪn kəmˈplitɪd

speaker: Maya
text: One. A few user sessions were affected temporarily because of a token mismatch, but it was resolved within minutes.
ipa: wʌn ə fju ˈjuzər ˈsɛʃənz wɜr əˈfɛktɪd ˌtɛmpəˈrɛrəli bɪˈkəz əv ə ˈtoʊkən ˈmɪsˌmætʃ bət ɪt wəz rɪˈzɑlvd wɪˈðɪn ˈmɪnɪts

speaker: Carlos
text: Alright. Let’s make sure that scenario is included in the incident review. It’s better if it gets analyzed for future prevention.
ipa: ɔlˈraɪt lɛts meɪk ʃʊr ðæt səˈnɛrioʊ ɪz ɪnˈkludɪd ɪn ði ˈɪnsɪdənt rɪˈvju ɪts ˈbɛtər ɪf ɪt ɡɛts ˈænəˌlaɪzd fɔr ˈfjuʧər prɪˈvɛnʃən

speaker: Maya
text: Already noted. A follow-up ticket has been created, and the engineering manager was notified this morning.
ipa: ɔlˈrɛdi ˈnoʊtɪd ə ˈfɑloʊ ʌp ˈtɪkɪt hæz bɪn kriˈeɪtɪd ənd ði ˌɛnʤəˈnɪrɪŋ ˈmænəʤər wəz ˈnoʊtəˌfaɪd ðɪs ˈmɔrnɪŋ

speaker: Carlos
text: Perfect. Another clean deployment — well done!
ipa: ˈpɜrfɪkt əˈnʌðər klin dɪˈplɔɪmənt wɛl dʌn
